      Overview

      MSc Computer Science graduate (Carleton University) with 3+ years of experience spanning backend development, data-driven applications, and AI/ML solutions. Proficient in AWS, RESTful APIs, and agile workflows, delivering scalable, high-impact solutions that improve system reliability, optimize performance, and support real-world decision-making.
